text: Niall James Horan (born 13 September 1993) is an Irish singer-songwriter. He was best known as a member of the boy band One Direction. In 2016, Horan signed a recording deal as a solo artist with Capitol Records. Horan has also been known for his relaxing, and upbeat style of music. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website of One Direction Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Irish pop singers Category:Irish guitarists Category:Irish rock musicians Category:Irish singer-songwriters Category:One Direction members
title: Niall Horan
